vision.notes: Visual capabilities in Lithoglyptidae are currently unknown based on available information.

mechanoreception.notes: Barnacles generally rely on mechanoreception to detect water movement and potential food sources. It is inferred that this family also possesses mechanoreceptive abilities.

chemoreception.notes: Barnacles use chemoreception to detect chemical cues in the water, aiding in feeding and settlement. It is inferred that this family also uses chemoreception.
